feed.subtitle: Postdoctoral Scholar at Stanford University researching AI reliability and agentic systems. Developer of Terminal-Bench and Weaver.

entry.title: Transfer Function Analysis and Perfect Tracking

link.title: Transfer Function Analysis and Perfect Tracking

entry.content: Transfer functions describe how a linear time-invariant (LTI) system transforms inputs into outputs. Representing a system in the frequency domain provides a compact view of its dynamics, making it easier to analyze stability, and fundamental performance limits.
entry.summary: Analysis of transfer functions and perfect tracking systems
